rows.label: qst630202_msg0001
rows.name:
I came all the way to stinky Avaritia
for a kick-ass hat, and what is this?
There's no kick-ass hats! Argh!

rows.label: qst630202_msg0002
rows.name:
I keep trying different shops and they
keep pushing ones made from fungus.
Have they gone insane...? Or have I?

rows.label: qst630202_msg0003
rows.name: Who're you?

rows.label: qst630202_msg0004
rows.name: Finally, someone I can talk to!

rows.label: qst630202_msg0005
rows.name:
I've traveled to the Avaritia Trade
Guild looking for some truly kick-ass,
fashionable headwear.

rows.label: qst630202_msg0006
rows.name: But I'm having no luck at all...

rows.label: qst630202_msg0007
rows.name:
My lame wannabe rhymer of an old
man is worried about me? Well, I'm
sorry, but I'm all out of damns to give.

rows.label: qst630202_msg0008
rows.name:
I've come here for hats, and by the
Architect, I'm not going back to Invidia
till I've found some!

rows.label: qst630202_msg0009
rows.name:
Woe, oh woe is little old me!
What's a girl gotta do to get a
sickening new hat around here...?

rows.label: qst630202_msg0101
rows.name:
Uhh, sorry, do you mind?
I've got nothing to say to you.

rows.label: qst630202_msg0102
rows.name: I don't think we have much in common.

rows.label: qst630202_msg0201
rows.name: Ahm...

rows.label: qst630202_msg0202
rows.name: A hat that would match this outfit...

rows.label: qst630202_msg0203
rows.name: Something simple, but graceful...

rows.label: qst630202_msg0204
rows.name:
With some high-end touches and
a whiff of luxury... That's the kind
of hat I want!

rows.label: qst630202_msg0301
rows.name:
So that hatter can make me one
exactly to order?

rows.label: qst630202_msg0302
rows.name:
Well why wouldn't he say so?!
I just can't with these Nopon...

rows.label: qst630202_msg0303
rows.name:
Anyway, I get the feeling you'll be more
suited to talking to him, so be a dear
and pass on my request, hm?

rows.label: qst630202_msg0304
rows.name: What I'm looking for right now, is...

rows.label: qst630202_msg0305
rows.name:
A hat that would match this outfit...
Something simple, but graceful...

rows.label: qst630202_msg0306
rows.name:
With some high-end touches and
a whiff of luxury... That's the kind
of hat I want!

rows.label: qst630202_msg0307
rows.name: I'm counting on you!
